job.title: Data Scientist - Python/Machine Learning
job.description: Work with the best in the industry on underwater vehicles! This Jobot Job is hosted by Tori Bender Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume. A Bit About Us Our client is changing the world through the development of ocean-based vehicles. They are transforming the way ocean data is collected and distributed worldwide, allowing scientists, engineers, and governments access to insights that were previously unobtainable. You’ll be a part of a team taking on earth’s last frontier! Why join us? 100% of benefits are covered for employees. Equity Job Details Your role Build Machine Learning models for various data sets Design and implement reports and quality visualizations of accuracy Produce documentation and presentations Work alongside other engineers to build an end-to-end data processing pipeline Skills Required Proficiency in various machine learning models (SVM, KNN, and CNN) Detailed understanding of Python and associated learning libraries Knowledge and use of databases Experience with producing real-world ML results What we’d like to see Show us evidence of your exceptional ability. Go ahead, brag! Industry Experience in Machine learning Independent project that demonstrates software proficiencies Nice to have Master's Degree, or equivalent experience, in a STEM field ITAR Requirements To conform to U.S. Government space technology export regulations, the applicant must be a U.S. citizen, lawful permanent resident of the U.S., protected individual as defined by ITAR (22 CFR 120.15) or eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S. Department of State. Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
